sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
from B_PBC_MTG_BASE_INFO
order by $orderByClause$
SELECT NVL(SUM(b.tot_Price),0) AS TOTPRICE FROM B_PBC_MTG_BASE_INFO b where 1=1 and SLAVE_CONTNO = #contno:VARCHAR#
